titles: A vindication of the Church of Scotland being an answer to a paper, intituled, Some questions concerning Episcopal and Presbyterial government in Scotland : wherein the latter is vindicated from the arguments and calumnies of that author, and the former is made appear to be a stranger in that nation/ by a minister of the Church of Scotland, as it is now established by law.
author: Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701.
notes: Written by Gilbert Rule.  Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Cunningham, Alexander. --  Some questions resolved concerning Episcopal and Presbyterian government in Scotland.
